name: stereotypically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the way that you would expect someone or something to be, do, behave, etc., even though this idea is often wrong: Brendan is a stereotypically disheveled academic. Stereotypically, Americans are very patriotic. See
stereotypical
More examplesFewer examplesHe is reserved in a stereotypically British way.Being hard-nosed and aggressive are characteristics stereotypically associated with men.Stereotypically, one doesn't associate the words "librarian" and "excitement".
